SpongeBob SquarePants
TV Show (1999 - 2012)
Add to My Picks Embed Cartoon about an accident-prone sea sponge who works in a fast-food restaurant and has adventures with his friends Patrick Starfish, Squidward and others. Clancy Brown Mr. Eugene H. Krabs Rodger Bumpass Squidward Tentacles Bill Fagerbakke Patrick Star Tom Kenny SpongeBob SquarePants Carolyn Lawrence Sandy Cheeks Mr. Lawrence Plankton All Cast&Credits Latest Episodes
Season 5 Episode 2: The Original Fry Cook Mr Krab's former fry cook visits, and SpongeBob is in awe of the world-renowned chef The Monster Who Came to Bikini Bottom; Welcome to the Bikini Bottom Triangle; The Curse of the Hex; The Main Drain Patrick befriends a sea monster; SpongeBob and Squidward search for answers when things begin to disappear from Bikini Bottom; Madame Hagfish puts a hex on the Krusty Krab; SpongeBob and Patrick search for a legendary drain on the ocean floor. Treats!; For Here or to Go SpongeBob brings home a box of new snail treats for Gary; when Plankton wins a free krabby patty, Mr. Krabs tries to keep him from collecting his prize.
